content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF BERKELEY HOUSING ADVISORY COMMISSION
REGULAR MEETING
February 20, 2026

CALL TO ORDER

TENANT PROTECTION PROGRAM UPDATE
Staff reported year-to-date outcomes for legal assistance and relocation support.
Members requested disaggregated data by neighborhood and income level.

[PAGE 2]
RENT STABILIZATION OUTREACH
Community partners described multilingual outreach progress and landlord training sessions.

ACTION
Commission directed staff to return with implementation options and funding impacts.

ADJOURNMENT
